mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_OUT_STOCK_DETAIL( id, out_code, item_spec, item_code, item_type, out_num, unit, quality_status, quality_us_code, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{outCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{outNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualityStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{qualityUsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO T_OUT_STOCK_DETAIL( id, out_code, item_spec, item_code, item_type, out_num, unit, quality_status, quality_us_code, create_time ) VALUES
( #{tOutStockDetail.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tOutStockDetail.outCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOutStockDetail.itemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOutStockDetail.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOutStockDetail.itemType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tOutStockDetail.outNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tOutStockDetail.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOutStockDetail.qualityStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tOutStockDetail.qualityUsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOutStockDetail.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_OUT_STOCK_DETAIL SET id = #{id}, out_code = #{outCode}, item_spec = #{itemSpec}, item_code = #{itemCode}, item_type = #{itemType}, out_num = #{outNum}, unit = #{unit}, quality_status = #{qualityStatus}, quality_us_code = #{qualityUsCode}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
